com.davidmiguel.gobees.hive

Class HivePresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidmiguel.gobees.hive.HivePresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HiveContract.Presenter, BaseLoadDataPresenter, BasePresenter

    class HivePresenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements HiveContract.Presenter
    Listens to user actions from the UI HiveRecordingsFragment, retrieves the data and updates the UI as required.
